subject: Nutrition
title: Eating Speed and Satiety
description: Learn Eating Speed and Satiety in one minute.

hook.text: It takes 20 minutes for fullness signals to reach your brain. Most people finish dinner in 11.

buildup.text: Fast eaters consume 10% more calories per meal because they outrun their satiety hormones.

discovery.text: Japanese research found slow eaters have significantly lower BMI and smaller waist measurements.

twist.text: Putting your fork down between bites reduces meal speed by 30% and calorie intake by 15%.

punchline.text: Eating slowly costs nothing and changes everything.
